page.title: 09AN AFTERNOON'S ACTIVITIES.
page.content: In sports at school we started running races and skipping races.Then we got changed and went out to afternoon play.I played handstands with my friends.The whistle went and we were sent in.After play we had Religious Education.Our teacher read us a story and we had to answer the questions.We did not have enough time for a story.We were dismissed and I walked home with my friends.I had a piano lesson.My lesson lasted 30 minutes. minutes.When my teacher had gone I went upstairs to change.I walked down the road to watch my friends play marbles.Then it was tea time.After tea we had a Christian house group in our house.After it I went to bed.
